Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class EntityQueryFilterProcessor

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.AbstractEntityFetchingViewProcessor
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.EntityQueryFilterProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityViewProcessor
@Component @Exposed @Scope("prototype") public class EntityQueryFilterProcessor extends AbstractEntityFetchingViewProcessor
Processor and page executor for EntityQuery based approach. For this filter to work, the class must have a valid EntityQueryExecutor and EntityQueryParser.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme

      public static final String EQL_PREDICATE_ATTRIBUTE_NAME
      Can hold an optional EQL statement that should be applied to the query being executed.

      public static final String ENTITY_QUERY_REQUEST

      • Constant Field Values

    • ENTITY_QUERY_OPERAND

      @Deprecated public static final String ENTITY_QUERY_OPERAND
      Deprecated.
      use EntityQueryOps.class instead
      Attribute on an EntityPropertyDescriptor that can optionally hold the EntityQueryOps operand that should be used when building a basic filter control for that property.

    • ENTITY_QUERY_CONTROL_MARKER

      public static final String ENTITY_QUERY_CONTROL_MARKER
      Css class that marks the control element which holds the value for the specified property. Only a single element should have the marker specified.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • ENTITY_QUERY_PROPERTY_TEXT_VALUE

      public static final String ENTITY_QUERY_PROPERTY_TEXT_VALUE
      Specifies whether the property value should be parsed as an EQValue or as an EQString. In the case of an EQString, the value should be true.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • ENTITY_QUERY_CONTROL_EVENT

      public static final String ENTITY_QUERY_CONTROL_EVENT
      Attribute on an EntityPropertyDescriptor that holds the event name that should result in an update of the entity query. Defaults to "change"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TEXT_VALUE_TYPES

      public static final List<? extends Class<? extends Serializable>> TEXT_VALUE_TYPES
